unit.fullMarkdown:
# UNIT 4.2: WINE PROGRAM MASTERY

**Duration:** 3-4 hours | **Trainer:** Kayla

## Wine Basics

| Type | Characteristics | Temperature |
|------|-----------------|-------------|
| White | Lighter, crisper, acidic | Cold (45-50°F) |
| Red | Fuller, tannic, complex | Room (60-65°F) |
| Rosé | Between, refreshing | Cold |
| Sparkling | Bubbles, celebratory | Very cold |

## Our Wine List

### Greek Whites
- **Assyrtiko** (Santorini): High acid, mineral, citrus, saline—pairs with seafood
- **Roditis**: Light, refreshing, stone fruit
- **Retsina**: Pine resin flavor (traditional)—try once!

### Greek Reds
- **Agiorgitiko** (Nemea): Medium body, cherry, plum—perfect with lamb

### Other Selections
- Sauvignon Blanc: Crisp, herbaceous
- Chardonnay: Ranges from crisp to buttery
- Cabernet Sauvignon: Bold, dark fruit
- Pinot Noir: Light-medium, versatile
- Syrah: Full body, peppery
- Rosé, Prosecco, Cava

## Wine Service
- Standard pour: 5 oz
- Whites/rosé from fridge, reds room temp
- Taste if questionable—DUMP IF BAD

## Jayna Pairings
| Dish | Wine |
|------|------|
| Lamb gyro | Agiorgitiko |
| Octopus | Assyrtiko |
| Falafel | Rosé or Roditis |
| Greek salad | Assyrtiko |

---
